title: The "White Elephant in the room" and the dark corners of the internet
description: NBC News Capitol Hill Correspondent Kasie Hunt and Republican Strategist Matt Gorman join Chuck to talk about the Republican reaction to mass shootings in El Paso and Dayton. Ben Collins scares Chuck with his latest reporting from the worst corners of the internet.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
